attr.title: Super Robot Ninja Girl
attr.desc: Set out on an epic quest to save Japan from an evil yakuza corporation! Fight your way out of the imperial palace and all the way into the heart of Tokyo's red light district where you will encounter the mafioso himself in an intense danmaku battle!
attr.inst: Download game from https://yaru.itch.io/super-robot-ninja-girl , copy data.win to /ports/superrobotninjagirl/gamedata
